title: Interpretation of a dream about answering a prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about answering a prayer in a dream: If a person sees himself in a dream calling upon God Almighty with supplication and reverence, and God grants him whatever He wants and grants him whatever He wants, then this is a human sign of many good things that the dreamer possesses. The next day of his life, many people rush to learn the interpretation of a dream to answer prayer in a dream. Do you pray for a dream to come true? Supplication has always been one of the acts of worship through which the servant approaches God Almighty, and supplication is a sign of the servant’s humility to God Almighty and reflects how much the servant needs To God Almighty. The truth of a person’s point of view and his need for God Almighty, and based on that, supplication in a dream will be answered, God willing. Also, supplication in a dream could be due to fear of what the dreamer fears, and it may also be a desire to achieve something that he desires from God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about my mother The dead woman who gave birth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of answering a prayer in a dream. The dream of answering a prayer in a dream is one of the dreams that brings with it a lot of goodness to the dreamer, a symbol of the goodness that the dreamer awaits. Through the following we explain the interpretation of a dream about answering a prayer in a dream: Dreaming about answering a request in a dream means that the dreamer’s desires will be fulfilled. Also, dreaming about answering a request in a dream is interpreted as a response to the command in reality. As was said in the dream, the interpretation of answering a request in a dream A person will obtain happiness, nourishment, and an abundance of goodness, God willing. Symbols of answering prayers in a dream: The dream of answering prayers in a dream carries many positive elements and interpretations for the dreamer. It is an indication of the response to prayers and the satisfaction of desires. The dream of answering prayers in a dream also carries many symbols. For example: Based on what Sheikh Al-Nabulsi stated, secret supplication in a dream indicates that the supplication will be answered, especially if the dreamer prays to God to give him a son and sees in the dream that he is praying to God in secret, as our master Zechariah did. Also, seeing rain in the dream in this regard is A symbol of responding to prayer, especially if it is a prayer of sustenance, provided that the rain does not harm God or his family. Light rain in a dream is a sign of a delay in responding to the request. Also, seeing prayer in the mosque in a dream is considered a good omen that a lot of good will happen. As a dream of supplication indicates In the mosque to accept the supplication. Entering the mosque and standing at its door is good news. See also: Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with a friend in a dream by Ibn Sirin. People respond to a request in a dream. A dream of answering a request in a dream is one of the dreams that comforts its owner and brings psychological comfort to his heart, and there are many symbols that if I saw it in a dream and through the following explanation of the interpretation of dreaming of answering a request in a dream, and the humanities of answering a prayer in a dream: Supplication in a dream is one of the most important auspicious dreams after supplication, especially if you see the night prayer after the supplication or you also see dawn. Likewise, whoever sees himself in a dream praying over the rain. Or he prayed out of fear and his supplication is salvation. It is a sign that the prayer is answered, God willing. It is also said that seeing non-compulsory prayer in a dream is one of the reliable signs.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing geese in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing geese in a dream, meanings of white geese in the dreams of single and married men and pregnant women, as well as signs of geese and ducks, seeing young geese, a symbol of slaughtering geese, and knowing the condition of geese in a dream, as it is one of the birds that resemble duck meat. However, when seen in a dream, it will certainly have many meanings and signs, so we turn to the interpretation of the dream of seeing a goose in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of geese in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that the interpretation of a dream of seeing geese in a dream indicates many blessings and benefits for the visionary. The dream of goose eggs in a dream is a sign that you have children, a good life, prosperity and a prestigious job. Seeing a goose I heard in my dream was a great disaster for me, it may be the loss of my lover or the loss of my loved ones. Dreaming of seeing geese hunting indicates the elimination of problems, the elimination of problems and wealth, and that people enjoy a high position. The dream in which you see a goose in a dream is a sign that you will get a new job or a new promotion and reach the highest position at work. The interpretation of a dream of a goose flying over the house in a dream is a source of a wonderful life, happiness and growth for the people of this house. Seeing a dream goose resting on a person's lap means that he has obtained great material benefits from people close to him. Interpretation of seeing a goose for an unmarried woman: Interpretation of a dream of a goose in the dreams of single women is one of Their ideal visions, which is good news for many people and hear their good news. Seeing a goose swimming in an unmarried woman's dream is a sign of good luck and success in her personal and professional life. An unmarried woman dreams of geese flying in the sky, and this indicates that engagement and marriage are close to the right person with whom they travel after marriage. The white goose feathers in an unmarried woman's dream indicate that her marriage is approaching and that the marriage and family are ready for it and comfortable with it. As for the dream of seeing black goose feathers on a woman, this is undesirable because it is a sign of personal sadness, tension and failed relationships. Interpretation of a dream about geese for a married woman: The interpretation of dreams about seeing geese in a dream for a married woman indicates a feeling of security, stability, happiness and inner peace with her husband and family. The dream of cooking geese in a married woman's dreams indicates prosperity, many blessings, many offspring, a lot of money, marital happiness and stability. Seeing goose feathers in a married woman's dream indicates that many quarrels with her husband make her unable to manage her family and feel hopeless. Roasting geese in A dream for a married woman indicates many concerns, problems and obstacles that she has faced recently. A dream about seeing a goose in a married woman’s dream indicates that if she waits for it, she will be pregnant in old age. Interpretation of seeing geese in a dream for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of a dream about seeing geese in a dream for a married woman indicates many concerns, problems and obstacles that she has faced recently. A dream about seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the king in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king in a dream: There are many dreams that we see in our dreams, and they may cause us discomfort and anxiety, or joy and happiness, and there are many interpretations that have been interpreted by great scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and other distinguished translators, such as These translators have interpreted many From visions and dreams to know good or bad. The interpretation of a dream about a king is one of the dreams that many people see and it has multiple interpretations that depend on the details and nature of the dream. Seeing the king in a dream and shaking hands with him. There are many dreams and multiple visions that the dreamer sees in his dream, which are linked to many of their connotations and signs, and the interpretation of the dream about the king is from Visions that explain and herald many good news, and one of the most prominent indications of seeing the king in a dream and shaking his whole hand is: seeing the monarch in a dream that the angel greets him and shakes hands with him is one of the dreams that portends goodness. The interpretation of seeing the king also indicates that this person will have a high status. Very. Also, this situation can be related to family and family or the fortuneteller’s own work. Moreover, the fortuneteller shaking hands with the king while interpreting the king’s vision shows a praiseworthy status and great love. Aside from the goodness the king brings to the hearts of those around him. Moreover The good things that he will give them will help them earn a living and make their families happy. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving gold in a dream to an unmarried woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the king visiting the house. We see in a dream many visions and dreams that indicate multiple signs and signals, The interpretation of a dream about the king is one of the visions that have been interpreted in different ways. The interpretation of seeing the king is one of the dreams that indicates the dreamer’s promotion at work. In addition to good luck in the world for the fortuneteller and assuming a prominent position for the fortuneteller. In addition, if the dreamer saw that the king was visiting him and was elegant And handsome, this indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s living conditions. The interpretation of seeing the king also indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance and blessings in the near future. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing money in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the king smiling in a dream. Various dreams and visions Which the fortuneteller sees in a dream, which is associated with many connotations and signs related to it, and the interpretation of the dream of seeing the king is one of the visions that explain and heralds many good news, and among the most important indications of seeing the king smiling in a dream are all of the following clues: Interpretation of seeing the king from the dreams that It indicates good news soon, God willing. In addition, the interpretation of seeing the king indicates the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations and the fulfillment of aspirations and goals. This dream also indicates the high status of the visionary and the high position he will reach. But if an unmarried girl sees that the king is smiling at her, this is evidence On the abundance of livelihood that you will obtain. Also, seeing the king

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying

preview.html: Interpretation is a familiar topic in psychiatry and is a way for the doctor to reach the depths of the human soul so that he can analyze his personality and find out where he is. In this article we will discuss the meaning of dream interpretation and take an example of this interpretation of a serious dream about crying, so that we know what is meant and what it indicates. Dream InterpretationThe fields of psychoanalysis, psychiatry and psychology have become an integral part of modern science, but much more important is the principle of scientific thinking In the mind. In the past the brain was a physical thing and the mind was part of the spiritual world. There was science about the brain and speculation about the mind, but after the appearance of the Austrian researcher Freud, the study of the mind became more serious and scientific. Regarding dreams, simply put, we first understood through Freud's theory that we dream for a reason. This reason is to deal with subconscious problems that the conscious cannot deal with. This theory means that the mind sets its own rules for dreams, and people have begun to discover these rules and their causes. In interpreting dreams, Freud said that he was the first to look at the mind and develop the theory of its basis and creation. Freud's statements in "Dreams" about consciousness and the unconscious described the ethereal parts of the mind that make us human. In fact, it laid the foundation for our current thinking about the mind. Before that, thinking was more spiritual. One of the dreams that a person often experiences is the dream of crying in a dream, but what is the interpretation of a dream of intense crying and does it have a bad or good meaning for the researcher? Interpretation of a dream of crying There are many analyzes through which we can interpret a dream of crying in a dream and they are as follows: Interpretation of a dream of crying Serious through psychoanalysisInterpretation of a dream about cryingIf you see yourself crying in your dream, it may mean that you want to express your feelings to someone or to people in general. If you see yourself crying in a dream, it may be anger, joy, pain, euphoria, etc., the feelings inside you may be suffocating you After you do not find comfort, and therefore you may see yourself overwhelmed with tears in the dream. If you see yourself crying in a dream after being hurt or harmed by someone on earth, you can see yourself expressing your sadness in your dream by crying, and this is also an indication that you are a person You are emotional by nature and tend to be overwhelmed by circumstances. If you see yourself crying and you are a sensitive person who starts crying just because you see someone crying in a movie, this does not scare him and there may not be any psychological distancing in your own life. Crying in a dream also indicates that the time has come To share your feelings or concerns with the people who are most important to you. These dreams may also indicate that you are suffering from depression and because it is not suitable for a healthy life, you will need to work your way over it. Interpretation of a dream about crying in the dream book There are many ancient interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, There are also modern commentators such as Muhammad Ratib al-Nabulsi, who wrote books on the interpretation of dreams. If a person sees in his dream that he is crying a lot, this indicates that he will get

title: Detailed interpretation of a dream about a mouse in the bedroom for married and single women

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of a dream about a mouse in the bedroom for a married and unmarried woman. Seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman comes with many different interpretations that scientists have come up with. Ibn Sirin also devoted a single chapter in his book The Interpretation of Dreams, and there are many interpretations that came for both married and unmarried women. Married women, in addition to divorced and pregnant women, which depends on their interpretation of the dreamer’s condition. Through the lines of our article, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a married woman, so that the interpretation of seeing a mouse in a married woman’s dream differs from seeing it for an unmarried woman, a pregnant woman, and other cases, and the interpretation of seeing a mouse for a married woman is as follows: If a married woman sees a small mouse In a dream, this indicates many problems that will arise between her and her husband. Also, many mice indicate a lot of food and abundant money that the dreamer will receive. However, black mice indicate lies and hypocrisy in a dream from the dreamer and what she does in her life. As for Seeing a white mouse indicates a woman’s mistreatment of others. Seeing a group of cats chasing a mouse means that all problems will disappear from a woman’s life. Finally, seeing a woman chasing a mouse is evidence of the harm that will befall her enemies and her victory over them. See also: A detailed interpretation of a dream about a sick person walking In a dream for unmarried, pregnant and married women. Interpretation of a dream about a gray mouse for a married woman. As for a married woman, we find that the interpretation of her vision of a gray mouse in a dream varies depending on the situation in which the married woman finds herself. This is interpreted as follows: Seeing a gray mouse in a married woman’s dream is a sign that there are many problems and differences between her and her husband, and all of these problems will end soon. But if the mouse is gray or black in a married woman’s dream, this means that she will be exposed to a major financial loss that will affect On her life. There are some interpreters who have shown that the dream interpretation of seeing a gray rat in a married woman’s dream does not indicate something bad, but rather because of the problems and difficulties that the woman is going through at the present time. See also: A detailed interpretation of the dream of an advancer of money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream Black mouse for a married womanThe color of the mouse in a dream greatly affects the interpretation of the dream that a married woman sees, so the interpretation of seeing a black mouse for her is as follows: If a married woman sees a big black mouse in a dream, this indicates the presence of a person in her life who has a lot of jealousy and envy. Also, seeing a black rat indicates jealousy or magic that prevents the dreamer from achieving his dreams and achievements, so he cannot move forward. A black rat in the dark indicates a narrow vision for many things, in addition to despair, weakness, and the inability to achieve any of the dreamer’s desired goals. The rat Black in a dream indicates a lot of negative thoughts within the dreamer, in addition to...

title: Interpretation of a dream about long hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair in a dream on the Moments website. I hope you like it and continue publishing what is new and what you are looking for and want to know on this website. You will find it on our distinguished website, the largest website in the Middle East. Interpretation of long hair in a dream Long hair in a dream is generally evidence of goodness, health and longevity, and it is the abundance of sustenance and money, and also an expression of superiority and creativity, as it indicates honesty and deep sincerity. Read also: Interpretation of a vision Cutting hair in a dreamInterpretation of long hair in a dream by Ibn SirinThe scholar and psychologist Ibn Sirin pointed out many meanings and connotations for long hair in a dream, as he stated that whoever sees his hair long and black in a dream, this indicates the arrival of good and abundant money to the owner of this insight. While whoever sees that his hair is long, soft, and soft, this indicates good health, and even if he is sick, he will recover and get rid of his illness. As for whoever sees his hair long and curly, this symbolizes the presence of some problems, disagreements, and complicated matters in his life, and that he will overcome them with some turmoil and confusion, while whoever sees his hair long and curly, this symbolizes the presence of some problems, disagreements, and complicated matters in his life, and that he will overcome them with some turmoil and confusion. He sees that his hair has changed to long hair like that of a horse, which indicates that he will reveal the secret that he even keeps. If he is sick, she will be lost. Interpretation of long hair in a dream for a single woman. As for an unmarried girl who sees her long hair in her dream, this indicates that she carries confidence with her and will keep it, because it indicates her long life and that there is great happiness that she will experience. Interpretation of long hair in a dream for a woman Married woman: If a woman is married and sees long hair in her dream, this means that she will become pregnant if she is barren, and it also indicates the affection and love that remains between her and her partner. Interpretation of long hair in a dream for a pregnant woman: As for a woman who sees that her hair is long during her pregnancy, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a hospital: seeing a hospital or clinic in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the hospital for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether visiting the sick, whether it is hospitalization, nurses, wounds, bandages, blood draws, and so on. Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq Hospital and Nabulsi. Seeing a hospital in a dream indicates the lack of security and anxiety that the viewer experiences in reality due to the fear of illness and illness. It has also been said to indicate the transition from narrowness to spaciousness and comfort and finding solutions to some of the problems that the viewer suffers from in reality. In other cases, it may refer to a visit Hospital or sickness clinic to the wife. Whoever sees in his dream that he is entering a sick clinic or hospital in a dream, then his vision shows his marriage in reality, God willing, especially if the dreamer is single. A patient who sees in his dream that he is leaving a sick hospital or clinic and leaving in his sleep, then seeing him is a sign and a sign of his recovery from the disease. And his recovery on the ground, God willing. As for the vision of leaving the hospital for someone who was not actually sick, his vision indicates the comfort, peace, and reassurance that he finds in his days and life. It was said in the vision of an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she entered the hospital or a sick clinic in the dream, and she appears Her vision of her marriage to a young man who proposes her engagement in the coming days. As for what the interpreters mentioned in interpreting the vision of a hospital in a married woman’s dream, they mentioned two cases: The first case is when the wife sees that the hospital or the hospital in the dream is beautiful, clean, and free of chaos. Such as an occasion to receive patients and her vision shows great interest in the cleanliness and tidiness of the house from the inside, but if this hospital or sick clinic, unlike the previous case, finds dirt and things appear that indicate poor cleanliness of this hospital, then her vision shows this wife’s failure to take care of her home and family. It was also said A married woman dreams that she enters a hospital or a clinic for patients, then her sight indicates that she is pregnant in reality. However, if she sees herself in a dream leaving the hospital, her vision may indicate disagreement and estrangement that affects the marital relationship between her and her husband due to their divorce. And the person who sees In his dream that he goes to a hospital or clinic so that the patients there receive treatment, his sight may indicate good news or happy events that the dreamer will find in his coming days. Likewise, if he sees in his dream that he is going to the hospital with the intention of visiting a patient, then his vision indicates goodness and progress. Towards what is desired and achieving it as a reality. Bandages or materials placed on a wound, fracture, or fire, and whenever a part of the body is exposed to damage, we find a specific form of these bandages whose shape and size vary according to the type of damage. In a dream, this symbol has multiple interpretations, depending on the person in it, and we will get to know Some of them are discussed in this article. Seeing bandages in a dream may indicate an insult. Whoever sees himself putting bandages on a person in a dream, this indicates atonement for a mistake and his confession. As for seeing an eye patch in a dream, it may indicate a request for forgiveness. Anyone who dreams that his body is surrounded or cabbage

title: Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a child with a boy in a dream varies according to the social status of the viewer, whether she is married, divorced, single, or pregnant in reality. Some also interpret it as anxiety, sadness, hostility, sins, and disobedience, so he will learn about the interpretation of this vision in detail according to senior interpreters. Interpretation of seeing a child An infant. Some scholars interpreted seeing a pregnancy in a dream with a boy as an unpleasant vision indicating distress, distress, and disagreement with her husband if the dreamer marries, indicating committing sins and transgressions, and God knows best. As for Ibn Sirin, he interpreted seeing a boy carrying a boy in a dream as anxiety and great responsibility. This will not happen. If a dead woman sees a pregnant child in a dream, then the vision shows her need to pray and get closer to God. However, if the dreamer is pregnant and her stomach is large, then this indicates a lot of pressure that is under this reality. And if she sees that she is pregnant with a boy and she is happy, then this It symbolizes goodness and money, but if the dreamer is sad, then the vision indicates anxiety and distress. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about childbirth and breastfeeding for a single woman with all interpretations Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is pregnant, this indicates the approaching pregnancy or a sign of anxiety and distress However, if she is not really pregnant, the dream may indicate her desire to become pregnant or that her pregnancy is approaching, and if she sees the gender of the fetus in the dream, this indicates good skin to come, but if she sees that she is pregnant and is not happy, then the vision symbolizes the many problems that she will face. As for If she is pregnant and has children and feels pain in the dream, then the dream indicates that God Almighty will give her a child, but if she does not feel pain from that pregnancy, then the vision here indicates that God will give her a child. Female. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant boy for a married woman who is not pregnant. If a married woman sees that she is pregnant with a boy when in reality she is not pregnant, this indicates the marital problems she is facing at the present time. In the event that she sees the married woman she knows pregnant with a child and is not actually pregnant, this means that she heard Unfavorable news about her, and in fact, the vision symbolizes the woman’s passing through it and her sadness. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy in a dream and when is it good or bad? Interpretation of a dream about transferring a boy to another person. Seeing a pregnancy with a boy for another person symbolizes the presence of hostility. And competition, and in the many responsibilities that fall on her, but if the cousin’s daughter is unmarried, the vision also symbolizes sadness. Seeing your unmarried friend pregnant in a dream is a sign of the adversity and difficulties that she is going through, but if your friend is pregnant and you see that she is pregnant With a son, the dream indicates that you are hearing good and promising news. Pregnancy with male twins can sometimes symbolize nourishment and benefit. As for whoever sees that he is sad because of his mother’s pregnancy, this indicates unhappiness in the dreamer’s life. And whoever sees that his mother is pregnant with a boy and she died in a dream, then seeing is a sign of difficulties and troubles.
